> Sunhawk (at attention):  I HAVE SET UP A SECOND SENSOR
> TO THE SOUTH SIR!  WHAT IS MY NEXT ASSIGNMENT SIR!
>

{Talos}

    Talos nodded at Sunhawks report. "Get some rest Sunhawk, you too Condor.
You've both done enough for today. Report to the mess hall and relax, both
of you." Turning back to the console the maximal commander sifted through
the reports, reading the somewhat grim reports of exactly what kind of shape
the ship was in.

Tomorrow he'd have to figure out exactly what to do further, the east and
western sensor arrays would have to be setup of course, the north and south
provided an extra range for their scanning equipment. They'd also have to
setup energon collectors, the mess hall supplies while in no real danger yet
would need restocking.

Going through the list he moved scouting and patrols towards the top, most
likely jobs for the two fliers that have proven their value so well the
first day, probably send Grimlock out with them, the dinobot could benefit
from a bit of Sunhawks military training...he doubted the two would mix any
better than paint and oil but it would be worth a gamble.

Looking through the list of available maximals and autobots he sat back
planning the duty roster for tomorrow...
